name: CreateAirtableWorkspace
description:
Create a new workspace in Airtable.

This tool creates a new workspace in Airtable within a specified enterprise account. It returns the ID of the newly created workspace. The user must be an active admin of the enterprise account to successfully create the workspace.

parameters.name: workspace_creation_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing 'enterpriseAccountId' (ID of the enterprise account) and 'name' (name of the new workspace).

enterpriseAccountId.description: The enterprise account that the workspace will be created in.

name.description: Name of the workspace to be created.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the airtable API.

enterpriseAccountId.description: The enterprise account that the workspace will be created in.

name.description: Name of the workspace to be created.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
